14/*! \file */
15
16#include <config.h>
17
18#include <stdbool.h>
19
20#include <isc/mem.h>
21#include <isc/stats.h>
22#include <isc/util.h>
23
24#include <dns/tkey.h>
25#include <dns/stats.h>
26
27#include <ns/query.h>
28#include <ns/server.h>
29#include <ns/stats.h>
30
31#define SCTX_MAGIC ISC_MAGIC('S','c','t','x')
32#define SCTX_VALID(s) ISC_MAGIC_VALID(s, SCTX_MAGIC)
33
34#define CHECKFATAL(op) \
35 do { result = (op); \
36 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS); \
37 } while (0) \
38
39isc_result_t
40ns_server_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, ns_matchview_t matchingview,
41 ns_server_t **sctxp)
42{
43 ns_server_t *sctx;
44 isc_result_t result;
45
46 REQUIRE(sctxp != NULL && *sctxp == NULL);
47
48 sctx = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*sctx));
49 if (sctx == NULL)
50 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
51
52 memset(sctx, 0, sizeof(*sctx));
53
54 isc_mem_attach(mctx, &sctx->mctx);
55
56 isc_refcount_init(&sctx->references, 1);
57
58 isc_quota_init(&sctx->xfroutquota, 10);
59 isc_quota_init(&sctx->tcpquota, 10);
60 isc_quota_init(&sctx->recursionquota, 100);
61
62 CHECKFATAL(dns_tkeyctx_create(mctx, &sctx->tkeyctx));
63
64 CHECKFATAL(ns_stats_create(mctx, ns_statscounter_max, &sctx->nsstats));
65
66 CHECKFATAL(dns_rdatatypestats_create(mctx, &sctx->rcvquerystats));
67
68 CHECKFATAL(dns_opcodestats_create(mctx, &sctx->opcodestats));
69
70 CHECKFATAL(dns_rcodestats_create(mctx, &sctx->rcodestats));
71
72 CHECKFATAL(isc_stats_create(mctx, &sctx->udpinstats4,
73 dns_sizecounter_in_max));
74
75 CHECKFATAL(isc_stats_create(mctx, &sctx->udpoutstats4,
76 dns_sizecounter_out_max));
77
78 CHECKFATAL(isc_stats_create(mctx, &sctx->udpinstats6,
79 dns_sizecounter_in_max));
80
81 CHECKFATAL(isc_stats_create(mctx, &sctx->udpoutstats6,
82 dns_sizecounter_out_max));
83
84 CHECKFATAL(isc_stats_create(mctx, &sctx->tcpinstats4,
85 dns_sizecounter_in_max));
86
87 CHECKFATAL(isc_stats_create(mctx, &sctx->tcpoutstats4,
88 dns_sizecounter_out_max));
89
90 CHECKFATAL(isc_stats_create(mctx, &sctx->tcpinstats6,
91 dns_sizecounter_in_max));
92
93 CHECKFATAL(isc_stats_create(mctx, &sctx->tcpoutstats6,
94 dns_sizecounter_out_max));
95
96 sctx->initialtimo = 300;
97 sctx->idletimo = 300;
98 sctx->keepalivetimo = 300;
99 sctx->advertisedtimo = 300;
100
101 sctx->udpsize = 4096;
102 sctx->transfer_tcp_message_size = 20480;
103
104 sctx->fuzztype = isc_fuzz_none;
105 sctx->fuzznotify = NULL;
106 sctx->gethostname = NULL;
107
108 sctx->matchingview = matchingview;
109 sctx->answercookie = true;
110
111 ISC_LIST_INIT(sctx->altsecrets);
112
113 sctx->magic = SCTX_MAGIC;
114 *sctxp = sctx;
115
116 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
117}
118
119void
120ns_server_attach(ns_server_t *src, ns_server_t **dest) {
121 REQUIRE(SCTX_VALID(src));
122 REQUIRE(dest != NULL && *dest == NULL);
123
124 isc_refcount_increment(&src->references);
125
126 *dest = src;
127}
128
129void
130ns_server_detach(ns_server_t **sctxp) {
131 ns_server_t *sctx;
132
133 REQUIRE(sctxp != NULL && SCTX_VALID(*sctxp));
134 sctx = *sctxp;
135 *sctxp = NULL;
136
137 if (isc_refcount_decrement(&sctx->references) == 1) {
138 ns_altsecret_t *altsecret;
139
140 sctx->magic = 0;
141
142 while ((altsecret = ISC_LIST_HEAD(sctx->altsecrets)) != NULL) {
143 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(sctx->altsecrets, altsecret, link);
144 isc_mem_put(sctx->mctx, altsecret, sizeof(*altsecret));
145 }
146
147 isc_quota_destroy(&sctx->recursionquota);
148 isc_quota_destroy(&sctx->tcpquota);
149 isc_quota_destroy(&sctx->xfroutquota);
150
151 if (sctx->server_id != NULL)
152 isc_mem_free(sctx->mctx, sctx->server_id);
153
154 if (sctx->blackholeacl != NULL)
155 dns_acl_detach(&sctx->blackholeacl);
156 if (sctx->keepresporder != NULL)
157 dns_acl_detach(&sctx->keepresporder);
158 if (sctx->tkeyctx != NULL)
159 dns_tkeyctx_destroy(&sctx->tkeyctx);
160
161 if (sctx->nsstats != NULL)
162 ns_stats_detach(&sctx->nsstats);
163
164 if (sctx->rcvquerystats != NULL)
165 dns_stats_detach(&sctx->rcvquerystats);
166 if (sctx->opcodestats != NULL)
167 dns_stats_detach(&sctx->opcodestats);
168 if (sctx->rcodestats != NULL)
169 dns_stats_detach(&sctx->rcodestats);
170
171 if (sctx->udpinstats4 != NULL)
172 isc_stats_detach(&sctx->udpinstats4);
173 if (sctx->tcpinstats4 != NULL)
174 isc_stats_detach(&sctx->tcpinstats4);
175 if (sctx->udpoutstats4 != NULL)
176 isc_stats_detach(&sctx->udpoutstats4);
177 if (sctx->tcpoutstats4 != NULL)
178 isc_stats_detach(&sctx->tcpoutstats4);
179
180 if (sctx->udpinstats6 != NULL)
181 isc_stats_detach(&sctx->udpinstats6);
182 if (sctx->tcpinstats6 != NULL)
183 isc_stats_detach(&sctx->tcpinstats6);
184 if (sctx->udpoutstats6 != NULL)
185 isc_stats_detach(&sctx->udpoutstats6);
186 if (sctx->tcpoutstats6 != NULL)
187 isc_stats_detach(&sctx->tcpoutstats6);
188
189 isc_mem_putanddetach(&sctx->mctx, sctx, sizeof(*sctx));
190 }
191}
192
193isc_result_t
194ns_server_setserverid(ns_server_t *sctx, const char *serverid) {
195 REQUIRE(SCTX_VALID(sctx));
196
197 if (sctx->server_id != NULL) {
198 isc_mem_free(sctx->mctx, sctx->server_id);
199 sctx->server_id = NULL;
200 }
201
202 if (serverid != NULL) {
203 sctx->server_id = isc_mem_strdup(sctx->mctx, serverid);
204 if (sctx->server_id == NULL)
205 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
206 }
207
208 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
209}
210
211void
212ns_server_settimeouts(ns_server_t *sctx, unsigned int initial,
213 unsigned int idle, unsigned int keepalive,
214 unsigned int advertised)
215{
216 REQUIRE(SCTX_VALID(sctx));
217
218 sctx->initialtimo = initial;
219 sctx->idletimo = idle;
220 sctx->keepalivetimo = keepalive;
221 sctx->advertisedtimo = advertised;
222}
223
224void
225ns_server_gettimeouts(ns_server_t *sctx, unsigned int *initial,
226 unsigned int *idle, unsigned int *keepalive,
227 unsigned int *advertised)
228{
229 REQUIRE(SCTX_VALID(sctx));
230 REQUIRE(initial != NULL && idle != NULL &&
231 keepalive != NULL && advertised != NULL);
232
233 *initial = sctx->initialtimo;
234 *idle = sctx->idletimo;
235 *keepalive = sctx->keepalivetimo;
236 *advertised = sctx->advertisedtimo;
237}
238
239void
240ns_server_setoption(ns_server_t *sctx, unsigned int option,
241 bool value)
242{
243 REQUIRE(SCTX_VALID(sctx));
244 if (value) {
245 sctx->options |= option;
246 } else {
247 sctx->options &= ~option;
248 }
249}
250
251bool
252ns_server_getoption(ns_server_t *sctx, unsigned int option) {
253 REQUIRE(SCTX_VALID(sctx));
254
255 return ((sctx->options & option) != 0);
256}
